website_summaries.verdict: Anyone who prefers soft, low-compression balls will like how these top-selling Callaway balls perform, though they may have a hard time keeping track of the blue ones.
pros: These soft balls generate praise for their low compression, distance, and spin
Comes with 4 different colors in the pack, and golfers rave about how easy the yellow and orange ones are to locate during a game
cons: Obviously, golfers who prefer balls with higher compression may not like them
The blue golf balls are sometimes difficult to see in the air or find on the green

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball
customer_reviews.text: I am a 72 year old lifetime golfer (handicap 13-15) who uses this ball to maximize my distance as my swing speed gets slower. I've tried almost all of the softer balls and this one is the best all around ball no matter the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Tull

customer_reviews.title: I was tired of loosing my balls!
customer_reviews.text: I practice on a small 9 hole course that is lined with trees and OB. I kept loosing my white balls and decided to try these bright orange balls to see if my lost ball issues would improve. These fly really well, are soft to the touch, and I have not lost a ball since I started playing with these. I doubt that I would use these when playing with other players but for playing by myself, they work great, feel great, and fly great.
customer_reviews.author: Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Supersoft for much more enjoyable play
customer_reviews.text: Nice response on the greens, Ive also noticed a more striaght drive, Compared to my usual slice with a driver. I was actually told by my golf trainer to use a softer ball, because of my swing speed and i havent been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good ball!
customer_reviews.text: Over the last few years I've played with colored balls just for the sake of ease. For the most part, you don't have to worry about getting your ball mixed up with other players. I was play the Srixon Z star ball and they work great. I now believe I prefer these over the Srixon. I like the matte finish and the green colored ball is even more bright than the yellow Srixon to me. I think they have comparable bite with approach shots to the green and I don't seem to lose distance of the tee with these. I think these are going to be my go to ball for a while.
customer_reviews.author: UNC2018

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find bright color
customer_reviews.text: These supersoft Callaway golf balls are amazing. Great feel and control.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great distance. My shots are 15 yards farther for all clubs. Prefer the yellow balls because they are easier to spot than the whites. The click sound on club impact is so, so nice.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Most brightly green ball, and ive tried quite a few. Best color ball at its pricepoint. Love the feel too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paz

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this ball for the past year and really likes the softness and the matt finish. He’s only used it in red. I ordered him a box of white for his league this summer and the white ball is not all that different than a normal ball. It has a bit of softness, but nothing compared to the red ball. I can’t speak for the other colors. The red ball has no shine and a real sticky feel. The white ball does not. I even gave one to my wife to make sure I wasn’t crazy and she said “that’s not the Supersoft ball, that something different”. I thought so too.
customer_reviews.author: WriterSteven

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to find a new ball to play with and gave these a shot. I think they are too soft for my liking. Part of the problem might be I have played the superhots for a couple rounds and I'm comparing them to each other. I do think these might play better as the weather cools down. In 70 degree weather I lost about 10-15 yards on the drive, and would go up a club to get the same distance I'm used to. On the plus side, I did not loose one, they are straight hitting, and do feel consistently soft off all clubs.
customer_reviews.author: mitsaru

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years playing Holf and using several types of Golf balls, these are my favorites
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: These are my second favorite ball.
customer_reviews.text: I like these balls second best, falling just short to Srixon soft feel balls. Sometimes these balls feel just a bit too soft for me. Hard to tell instant feedback about where on the club face you just struck it. Whereas the Srixons are a bit more clicky feeling which I like. I do tend to putt surprisingly well with this ball though. They scuff decently easily so if you flirt with trees, rocks, or cart paths much you’ll have a bag full of marred Callaways. But good distance and a good ball overall.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Casual golfer approved
customer_reviews.text: I golf maybe 5 or 6 times a year. I'm pretty bad. That being said, these balls helped me suck a bit less. When I bork a shot, it's typically a slice...but the round that I played with these balls my slices weren't as bad and less in frequency. I don't know how much was the actual ball and how much was a placebo, but whatever it was, I'll take any help I can get! The aesthetic of the ball is super nice too. Not hard to find and a unique and bright matte color. The balls are numbered 1-4 if you happen to play with others using the same ball (unlikely). No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Danger

customer_reviews.title: I would not have believed a ball could make a difference in my game but it did
customer_reviews.text: I have known very very good golfers that use Srixon but being a marginal golfer (high 90's) I did not think the ball would make much difference for my striking, but this ball has a better "feel" and better sound off the club head. It could be that I am getting better (finally), but I really believe I have more control and less often shank the ball when it isn't exactly in the sweet spot. And the price is pretty much in there with most reasonably good balls. Plus, I like the idea of playing with a ball the better golfers insist upon. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: John Schmit

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Golf Supersoft Golf Balls, (One Dozen) -- Matte Finish 'green'
customer_reviews.text: Played 'Callaway Supersoft with "matte" finish after finding one and being pleased with both distance and spin. Didn't find enough -- hence, the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hrh1945

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Pros ⬇️ Long distance Flat coating Bright color Good price Great controllability Cons ⬇️ No cons found ————————- I highly recommend these golf balls
customer_reviews.author: Alex the Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and very green! Love these balls! These and the duosoft from wilson are the softest balls I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Sefff

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, still getting used to the matte feel of the ball, sticks in your pocket if you're keeping a spare. It has almost a slight rubbery feel to the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Harisston Turk

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy these...durable, soft feel, pretty, distance..
customer_reviews.text: Soft feel, great distance, and very visible. Getting around 280 on my drives consistently. Putted and chipped fantastic too. Overall I really like them and will be ordering more. The green may be more visible so I will try those. I enjoy playing with a pretty new ball...brings me joy and confidence...confidence brings about better results. So, not a magic ball...but a nice golf ball that makes my golf game better. I gave it the Carol Baskin yesterday and really whacked it.
customer_reviews.author: RN^2

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for us old guys!
customer_reviews.text: My pro recommended the Supersoft - said it is the prefect ball for us " experienced" (translation - "old") golfers who have lost some swing speed. And he was right. I'm driving about 8-10 yards more than when I use a Pro V-1. And it spins very nicely with a wedge and rolls nicely on the green. If you've lost some swing speed as you gain "experience," this is a terrific golf ball.
customer_reviews.author: Deep in the Heart of Texas

customer_reviews.title: BITES TO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: Compared to white balls of which I ordered at the same time. The orange balls bite and do not roll like the others. My wife with no prodding from me said the same thing. We golf 4 to 6 times a week. Not Happy with the matte finish balls at all. Gary
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing Callaway balls for three years and loved the Supersoft and Chrome Soft. I cannot hit this new matte finish to save myself. I gave them away after the first round with them. However, the person I gave them to does not like them either. A coworker also said the same about them. Needless to say, I will not be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these out for a recent game and loved them! I played one of my best rounds, will be using these instead of ProV1, way cheaper and I liked the orange. Easy to find on the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Cheatum

customer_reviews.title: Love the matte balls. Feel like butter off the face
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the matte green balls and love the look and feel of them. These are without a doubt the softest balls I have ever used. I love the color and get a lot of comments on it. The contact feels great, distance is good, and around the green spin is good for the softness. For me, feel is the most important aspect of a golf ball and these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: HallaDurg

customer_reviews.title: I didnt find them that soft or spinny
customer_reviews.text: I come from the Titleist pro v1 gang . . i tried these, i loved the high vis feature of the bright green for when i am playing alone and they are easy to see and find. But . . . .i did not find them that soft, especially putting or around the green. My younger son loved them . . .they are a great value, but not the best ball for my game. Certainly worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: They felt good coming off my club and I am driving them (at age 77) further than I did 30 years ago. Though it would be nice for even my ugliest shots to end up in the middle of the fairway, it does not happen and though orange would seem to be easy to find I still spend a lot of time searching - perhaps, it they lit up or beeped it would be easier to find them. I use one per game and if I lose it I just go back to my oldies until the next game. However, next buy will probably be them or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: SONARCHIEF

customer_reviews.title: Softest Golf Ball Made
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls are the best, especially for those players with slower swing speed. They fly well and are descent around the green. Let's be clear, they do not bite as well as Pro-V1 but cost so much less that unless you are very low handicap player, it won't matter. Love the Orange color. They are easy to see in flight and easy to find in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Joe325

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different types of golf balls in my 2 decades of playing golf and I can comfortably say, at least for now, this is the best golf ball I've ever used and if they remain this way I'll never buy a different ball unless I have to. These were recommended to me by my brother-in-law and now our whole group uses these and loves them. Not to mention, Callaway makes some of the best clubs on the market. Their Rogue driver is an absolute dream to use and has completely enhanced my driving game.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: They won't put me on the tour. Actually, nothing will, I'm not very good. However I do like these balls a lot. The color takes some getting used to, but once you play a couple rounds with them and get accustomed to them, they are very nice. They fly long and straight, and are easy to find. Not much spin, but truthfully I don't need that so it doesn't bother me. For the price I will keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great value 2 piece that plays better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good feel, decent spin, soft and long of the tee. If you can't hit 250 with your driver here is your answer. If you short greens here is your answer. If you like to bump and run to the back of the green here is your answer. If you leave your putts short all the time here is your answer. If you are 9 HDC or below, buy the good stuff. This is for 18+ HDC who should play a 2 piece. 12 HDC play 3 piece. Scratch HDC 4 piece.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They will improve your game!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Dad for Father’s Day based on the reviews as I don’t golf and I’m glad I did. My father golfs 4 days a week and is 70 years old so he has golfed for at least 25 years. He said these balls actually improved his game which he never thought a ball could do. Now this is all he buys and he said this color seems to have a different coating that helps but they all work as he has had another color. I also bought a pack of $75 balls at a sporting goods store but he said these were better
customer_reviews.author: Alise Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: My new favorites
customer_reviews.text: I a little hesitant to try these. Green golf balls? I won't be able to find them most of the time, or so I thought . As it turns out they are easy to see even from a couple hundred yards away. I've now been using them all summer and probably will next year as well.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Cowley

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Callaway is by far one of the greatest most trusted names in the sport of golf. These golf balls are one of my top favorite to use mainly for the color (easier to see) and the feel when you hit a solid strike with your club. I’m not a professional golfer, how we Callaway is well known among golfers and you absolutely will not be disappointed with your purchase. Everything from the packaging to the performance of the ball will leave your extremely satisfied. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Chrismabraham

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good ball
customer_reviews.text: I'm no pro golfer. I decided to try these because I ran out of my usual brand of soft golfball. I did have some nice shots with these balls but like anyother golf equipment...don't expect miracles..it's the golfer not the equipment. These ball were more than adequate for my game and I thought the price was reasonable. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KH13850

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball (pink) for the fall season!
customer_reviews.text: This ball does what's advertised. It's super soft (duh?). My driver swing speed is 107mph - I noticed a one club increase in distance on an average across all my clubs - but it's really hard to put any spin on it. You'll have to land it short and let it run out. I play this ball in fall when there are dead leaves on the course, and the pink color is so easy to spot :)
customer_reviews.author: Neil Sagan

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball. Super soft feel, flies great, and the orange color is much easier to find compared to a white ball which means fewer lost balls. Also there is never a doubt which ball is mine. I love watching the orange ball fly through the air and the color really pops against the sky no matter the weather or time of day. It's fun to play with. Plus I'm tired of paying $4+ per ball for Pro v1 and I'm always afraid to lose the damn thing which is distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Ballgame

customer_reviews.title: Super soft green balls
customer_reviews.text: I played golf for the first time and my favorite color is green so got these super soft green balls. I sucked but can't blame these super soft green balls. I also can't say these super soft green balls improved my only game but they felt nice to hold (so soft in your hands) and was easy to find. I'll never play again but at least now I have these super soft green balls.
customer_reviews.author: Ruz

customer_reviews.title: Good distance spin and feel
customer_reviews.text: A nice ball , has good feel and adequate spin. It is recommended for slower tempo swings and easier to compress. I find distance a little more and higher ball fight.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for slow swings!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 69 years old and I can honestly say I've never really had a fast swing and now it's even slower. These balls have made a huge difference in my game. There have been a few times I've outdrove the bigger hitters in my usual foursome. I'm also getting tremendous control in my short game with these. I'm not sure but I think the matte finish makes a difference. I like the lime green color too, very easy to track in the sky and even easier to find in the fairway and rough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elmlinger

customer_reviews.title: Good golf balls
customer_reviews.text: These were my go to balls till I tried another brand. They are long and pretty good around the green
customer_reviews.author: Retireddawg

customer_reviews.title: Not in the pink
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls are not the neon pink indicated on the web site. They are more salmon pink than a rich deep pink. I'm also not happy about the matte finish and will be careful not to order this finish in the future. The matte finish won't adhere my golfdotz decals. But the matte finish choice is on me. We will see how they play today.
customer_reviews.author: Andiamo Subito

customer_reviews.title: Good feel and distance
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 62 year old golfer with a less powerful swing than in the old days. These balls provide a great combination of distance and feel for me. Not sure if they're my favorite, but definitely up there
customer_reviews.author: Mark Truman

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to see on fairway and easier to find in the deep stuff. Update: Bright doesn't prevent theft by river, pond or very thick vegetation. Still have a few left, but like these so much, decided to purchase again. Surprise!! Price has gone up $12 in less than a month. Must be real popular.
customer_reviews.author: Junic Archer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these balls!! I say “loved” because my son and I managed to lose ALL of them after playing only 7 holes. 🙄 I’m re-ordering now but won’t be ordering the green ones this time!! 😬😅
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Feel Nice, but Hard to Track
customer_reviews.text: The balls themselves have a nice feel to them (that's what she said) but they were surprisingly tough to track off the tee. I got them for the sole purpose of being able to find them if I hit them astray, but it was even harder to see the flight path of the ball. Guess I'm switching back to regular white balls.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling ball.
customer_reviews.text: Been golfing 50 plus years, played just about every new must have ball out there. This super soft ball has really impressed my. Never have I hit a ball with such a soft feeling. This ball is a long as any other and Callaway claims it goes straight....seriously. What ball manufacturer dosen't though lol
customer_reviews.author: Gregg E

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: Great balls. I love the way they play and how I hit them. Watch out though. I bought the fist box for about $19. Second box for $23. When I went to buy a 3rd they magically went up again to $40. They were still $19 on a golf website where I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best amateur ball for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have been using supersoft for almost 2 years. It’s great off the driver, iron or putter. The value is unbeatable. If I had to say one bad thing, it would be that the cover is so soft it gets damaged easy but considering it’s 60% less than the high end balls I’m willing to accept that.
customer_reviews.author: Dameion Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Love the new soft balls.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with my new soft balls is the old fart hitting them !!! There is a disconnect between intent and execution !!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H. Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Ball
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to play with them today. This is now my new favorite ball. Drove it further and it agrees with my slower swing speed. Experimented with the matte green ones also, but nah I def know its optic yellow or matte yellow for me and no other color. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Go Dawgs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome golf balls. Got them for my husband that typically doesn’t like colored balls, so I got them some what as a joke after he kept loosing them. He ended up loving them more than all the other brands he has tried. Great price too, these sell for way more at the golf shop.
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD AVERAGE BALL
customer_reviews.text: I've seen these sold a various price points in many stores so I bought a box. They do fly well. There were additional yards gained from bounce and roll. Not a consistent ball for me. A couple of 7 iron shots close to my aveare while other's were really long from bounce and roll out.
customer_reviews.author: wyman2004

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: Callaway makes an excellent golf ball. I chose this soft golf ball for increased distance and forgiveness. I have been very happy with my purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Kamacaru

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and you can see it miles away
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these balls feel great and fly well: long and straight. I like the matte color. They are low spin, so it can be a little rough trying to flop one down on the green, but not impossible. However, I have never seen a more visible ball in my life. You can see this thing from miles away, even in tall grass. I've seen other bright colors like red and yellow, but this one takes the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: High performing, flashy, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Ah yes, super soft. The softest balls out there! I’m a man and there’s nothing like playing pink balls on the golf course to make me feel more comfortable in my masculinity- lol I busted these out last week and really enjoyed hitting them. They respond well, spin well, and go far. I’m a mid handicapper with a high swing speed. I like these balls because at half the price of proVs they are still high performing, flashy, and fun.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Green/yellow color. Overall liked a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a novice but overall liked these balls for the money. They also are more of a green/yellow which I prefer. They are not a true yellow like a lot of the range balls. They seemed to come off really nicely on my wedge shots particularly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball for average swing speeds around 85 mph
customer_reviews.text: Great amature ball, reasonably priced, I like the orange color, soft feel when putting and I feel like I am hitting maybe 10 yards further than a regular compression ball. 71 year old male. Have purchased again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hodgkins

customer_reviews.title: You should try this ball.
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel around the greens and distance I get with the Calloway Super soft balls. Great ball for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Scott

customer_reviews.title: Probably my favorite golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Hands down probably my favorite golf ball. What I love about the orange ones is it is easier for me to spot my ball compared to the white ones and less likely to get mixed up with someone else’s.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parra

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great golf ball for the price. This is a quality ball and plays better than many higher priced balls. Just my opinion though. Speedy delivery. Thank you for your time and consideration.
customer_reviews.author: louise a rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Straight!!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a soft ball...mostly for the feel around the green and putting..I used to use Chrome Soft but I find these balls are softer and straighter than the Chrome and for a much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: T Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Callaway soft balls
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! love the red ones. real easy to follow and find in high rough. very good feel when chipping and putting, My drives seemed to be about 10-15 yards longer. Like these so much I gave my golf partner a box. Highly recommended for amateurs like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Biff Raines

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Ball!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a golf ball that feels great, looks great and is easy to find. Look no further. I have played with a number of different brands over the years but the Callaway takes the cake!!! Great feel and control on the ball. Perfect balance. Not sure I can go back to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Elwood

customer_reviews.title: allaway Golf Supersoft Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: great golfballs if you like soft. good pricing vs other suppliers seems to fly straight and no issues with fly of the ball recommend to purchase if you want a soft ball
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great golfball!
customer_reviews.text: I love how bright the lime green is as it's so easy to spot on the course. I have not noticed any loss in distance with this ball, but find it very responsive in my short game.
customer_reviews.author: Jane C P

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball for women.
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this Callaway golfball online for a couple of years not only for the great price and convenience but it has been a good ball for a woman's game.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen P. Leutz

customer_reviews.title: Like them-ok around green
customer_reviews.text: More distance for me than pro-v. Senior golfer with 95 or so swing speed. Fly straight if you hit it right. Color good during summer months but could Be trouble when leaves start to fall(neon green)
customer_reviews.author: Brent Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They were great most of the time I suck at golf now I look good sucking at golf and they don’t smell like rotten banana I hate the smell of rotten banana also I like the smell of fresh banana
customer_reviews.author: Public Profile Name

customer_reviews.title: Great feel when hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different brands to try. These were my favorite! When I hit it, the ball just moved with the club. It went straight and pretty far. I will buy move off these.
customer_reviews.author: lovemyguy

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Some of the finish on the balls wasn’t consistent in this pack. I love playing them in the red or green finish they are amazing for any handicapper. The colors just pop and the feel is amazing. The only issue was maybe with this pack the colors were inconsistent and faded unlike packs I’ve gotten before.
customer_reviews.author: richard hetzel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Olde Phartz.
customer_reviews.text: I’m just a male senior hack...age 73, 20hdcp. I have tried a number of ball options, but these are far superior. Great “feel” and ball flight. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SCWer

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball for those of us who have a slower swing speed. The ball jumps off the club face. It received just 3 stars because of the price. Saw them for $3.50 less at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Taxed Enough Already

customer_reviews.title: Good Soft Golf Ball
customer_reviews.text: Good 35 compression golf ball. I like a higher compression ball so not for me.
customer_reviews.author: scotts33

customer_reviews.title: good distance but hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: the cover is alot like volvik but gets very dirty with every shot. Need a wet towel after every shot. it does get good distance for the price
customer_reviews.author: mikeo

customer_reviews.title: Great for slower swings.
customer_reviews.text: As I have aged it’s harder to see the ball. This color has great visibility. Also, my ritis boys have taken some of my distance away. This soft cover actually gave some of it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lasseter

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: The color is awesome. Love the ball and how it performs. Hits true and I get extra yardage. Great for fall golfing to see it in the leaves on the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Piliero

customer_reviews.title: These Balls CRACK Easy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe hit this ball 50 times, maybe. And not once with a driver, this was all done in my garage into a hitting screen with irons. Cheap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chapman

customer_reviews.title: These are the softest balls ever created.
customer_reviews.text: you can barely feel these balls as you strike them. softest balls i’ve ever played with. great around and on the greens. played 2 rounds so far with the same ball and no damage as of yet. i’d say they’re pretty darn good for $20 a dozen.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Steele

customer_reviews.title: Soft but low spin around greens
customer_reviews.text: Soft feeling golf balls but not very much spin around the greens. Others in the same price range are much better; Kirkland, E12, etc are better balls
customer_reviews.author: Mattimus85

customer_reviews.title: Great ball but...
customer_reviews.text: I love to play with this brand but the red color just isn't for me. It's not as easy to track as the "yellow" color. A good ball but I wouldn't order this color again.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these balls, play really well from tee to green. I’m 50 so I can’t see a white ball in the air well anymore, but these make it so easy to track all the way around the course
customer_reviews.author: Mikevinmatt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Very soft feel. I bought the red color and it is so easy to find on the course and easy to track the flight of the ball in any condition. My favorite ball.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Added distance.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these balls. Added 15-20 yards distance. Had to adjust club selection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel on the greens.
customer_reviews.text: I usually play Titleist or Bridgestone balls I can’t say enough about these Callaway balls. They have great feel on the greens and that color helps when you are a little errant off the tee. Don’t hesitate on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas DelVisco

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my stepdad for Father’s Day. He usually loves Calloway everything so I’m sure these will be appreciated. Titelist are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tony DiSilvio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Callaway supersoft were a great addition to my golf bag. The product flight and strike is great. The only down side to the lime green color they are hard to find in taller rough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Packaging is nice, golf balls arrived undamaged and clean. Can’t wait to lose all these on the course!
customer_reviews.author: saxaddict14

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bright color in the summer months. Easy to see and fine. Has a decent soft feeling. Price was right will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Copley CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I golf around five days a week during the season, love these balls!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Buchalski

customer_reviews.title: It only had 4 balls in the box.
customer_reviews.text: There were only four balls in the box. I will never buy this product again! Amazon was great to deal with in getting my money back though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Trauger

customer_reviews.title: Instead of pay $21 for one sleeve which is three balls. Big rip off.
customer_reviews.text: The Photo lead one to believe The purchase was for 12 golf balls. Instead of pay $21 for one sleeve which is three balls. Big rip off.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf ball
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls have great feel. They seem to fly straight and have good distance. I really like these golf balls!
customer_reviews.author: PBL

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these and said you really see a difference in performance with these golf balls. Hard to imagine.... it's a golf ball. But it actually does better.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Super golf balls with great feel
customer_reviews.text: You just can't beat these balls. I've hit a hundred different types of balls and keep going back to these. Simply can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Rich V.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tried them yet.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried these balls yet but they feel and look great! I will update once I get a chance to try them out on the course!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball! Great colors fam.
customer_reviews.text: I hit these well and I can spot the red finish from a good distance away. Until fall... then they get lost in the leaves. Yolo!
customer_reviews.author: Bajowa Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Good ball I guess
customer_reviews.text: They work great as long as you don't hit them in the woods or in the water! Personal testament.....they don't float.
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about these balls. They're easy to spot, the feel coming off the clubhead is superb, and they fly. Only bad thing is they are so slow on the green you must practice strictly with is exact ball your putter swing.
customer_reviews.author: DangerWillRobinson

customer_reviews.title: These are great and inexpensive golf balls.
customer_reviews.text: I really like callaway super soft, and the matte orange is vibrant, easy to see and hit. Now if only I didn’t suck so bad at the game, oh well, it’s not the balls fault
customer_reviews.author: michael matanky

customer_reviews.title: Great golf balls!
customer_reviews.text: Great golf balls, but they get lost too easily. Mine ended up in water, in the woods, and in sand. Wait...maybe that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: To soft
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls don’t travel as far as others. The soft cover seem to show scuff very easy. Wish they were a bit harder.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf Supersoft Golf Balls
feature_bullets: The Callaway super soft is a long, straight distance ball that’s incredibly soft
An ultra low compression core promotes fast ball speed and increased accuracy
New Low Drag HEX Aerodynamics are optimized to reduce drag and enhance lift for longer carry and longer distance
A new softer Trigonometry cover formulation has a low compression for enhanced feel and increased greenside control

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
